front.title: Proximity Proxies for Mobile Nodes and Mobility Agents (PPM)

abstract.t: This document aims to explore an approach for the interoperability testing of Mobile IP implementations across the Internet. It proposes client/server proximity proxies, two intermediate entities between the mobile node and the mobility agent. This model can be used to solve the problem addressed in the hierarchical foreign agents model. The document proposes to build a tunnel between proximity proxies using Tunnel Request and Tunnel Reply messages, and enable routing policies to the tunnel by using Proxy Update message and adding a bit in Agent Advertisement message.
